verbose_text: Earlier studies showed that the EGFR is frequently overexpressed in non-small-cell lung cancer (NSCLC) and EGFR mutations at specific amino acid residues in the kinase domain induce altered responsiveness to gefitinib, a small molecule EGFR tyrosine kinase inhibitor.
evidence: EGFR mutations at specific amino acid residues in the kinase domain induce altered responsiveness to gefitinib
